page.title: 02FARMING SOUTH OF MANSFIELD.
page.content: The farms in our area are Firs Farm(184 acres)Rushley Farm(250 acres) and Stonehills Farm(360 acres).Both Rushley and Firs Farms are arable.The former having 4 workers and the latter with 7. Stonehills Farm is a mixed farm,farmed by 3 poeple.Stonehills Farm grows grass,potatoes,winter wheat and oats. Rushley Farm produces spring barley,hay,linseed,oil seed rape and oats.Firs Farm produces sugarbeet. All the farms produce winter barley.All of the farms have at least six cows.Only Stonehills Farm keeps sheep.
